website_summaries.verdict: If slipping is your main safety concern, look no further than these grooved-sole shower shoes.
pros: Heavy duty grooved soles independently tested and proven to resist slipping
No inside front and back seams to create skin issues
Higher back on uppers to minimize slippers coming off feet
Available in a variety of sizes
cons: Elastic may not hug feet securely at the smaller end of the range

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to slip in these...
customer_reviews.text: No more bath tub mats or sticky tape strips. These slippers are comfy and definitely more effective than anything else I've tried or even heard of. I put them on to get into the tub when taking a sit down bath. Take them off while washing my feet and slip them back on to get out. When I shower they are on the entire time except for a brief time as I remove one at a time to wash feet. Highly recommend for a safe bathing experience. Would also be good for any slick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Super Grip Soles
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes for my father who has fallen several times in the shower. The shoes have a great sole that is helping him move around more confidently in the shower. I ordered XL size, that said 10-12. My dad wears size 12 and these were too small. However, I cut the toe to give his toes more room and this is working. I think the size should only be listed to maybe an 11. I would recommend these for anyone having trouble with slipping in the shower.
